alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 4:23PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Greene and western Clay Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 423 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Biggers, or 11 miles southwest of Corning, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corning, Reyno, Knobel, Success, Peach Orchard, Delaplaine, Datto, Heelstring, Brookings, Twin Oaks and Palatka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
